# Read App Store Version Localization Information

**Web Service Endpoint**

Read localized version-level information.

## Getting Version Localizations

- **List All App Store Version Localizations for an App Store Version**: Get a list of localized, version-level information about an app, for all locales.

items.description: Get a list of localized, version-level information about an app, for all locales.
